general_advisory: Sow rice and wheat considering the rainfall patterns. Provide necessary care to poultry.

advisory: Ensure adequate water availability for rice cultivation.
Fertilize as per schedule to maximize yield.
Monitor wheat fields for pest infestation and take necessary measures.
Harvest wheat at the right time for better quality.
Maintain proper hygiene in poultry housing areas.
Provide balanced feed to ensure healthy growth of poultry.
